name: Vectorium
description: Vectorium is a classical, yet intense arcade shooting game. Can you survive those dreadful enemies and barrage of gunfire?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / Vista Processor: Intel Pentium Dual-Core E2000 Series(1.6 GHz) or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600GT or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
